coding_practice.title: Merge k Sorted Lists
coding_practice.description:
You are given an array of k linked-lists lists, each linked-list is sorted in ascending order.

Merge all the linked-lists into one sorted linked-list and return it.

examples.explanation:
The linked-lists are:
[
  1->4->5,
  1->3->4,
  2->6
]
merging them into one sorted linked list:
1->1->2->3->4->4->5->6

coding_practice.constraints:
k == lists.length
0 <= k <= 10^4
0 <= lists[i].length <= 500
-10^4 <= lists[i][j] <= 10^4
lists[i] is sorted in ascending order.
The sum of lists[i].length will not exceed 10^4.
coding_practice.explanation:
1. 使用分治法，將 k 個鏈表兩兩合併。
2. mergeRange 遞迴地合併左半部和右半部鏈表。
3. mergeTwoLists 合併兩個排序鏈表，返回排序結果。
4. 返回所有鏈表合併後的結果。
5. 時間複雜度 O(N log k)，空間複雜度 O(log k)。
